github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use conventional commit format: type(scope): description.
Type must be one of feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci, build, revert.
Ensure type and scope are lower-case.
Subject must not be empty, not end with a period, and must be under 72 characters.
Use imperative mood: e.g., 'Add feature', not 'Added feature'.
Keep header ≤72 chars; body lines ≤100 chars.
Separate header from body with a blank line.
If necessary, include a footer formatted with blank lines.
